name: Spooks Ooaaga
text: hello there... [enter to see dialogue and chat with customers]

name: Spooks Ooaaga
text: ahhh.. im half dead, sure would like a brew of golem tears and serpent spit

name: Spooks Ooaaga
text: I’m just here for the boo’s. Get it? Because I’m a ghost? Uh… whatever- just get me my order

name: Spooks Ooaaga
text: sooo i haven't seen someone as boo-tiful as you- get it?
